product_desc:
Clay Burnett Group (CBG), founded in 2008, is a preeminent executive search firm headquartered in the greater Los Angeles and Orange County area with a statewide reach confidently offering quality services to all industries. Look to CBG for the best professionals. Representing industry leaders in a principled and disciplined way, our executive recruiters find the most qualified candidates for every situation. 

If you’re a trained professional in Accounting & Finance, Information Technology, Human Resources or Operations; contact us. We recruit the best people for the best jobs. We will keep your search completely confidential and respect the need to be discrete always. The ideal fit for your next career move requires a comprehensive understanding of your wants, needs and aspirations. 

We believe our clients and candidates deserve a first class experience. Please connect if you're searching for a qualified professional or open to hearing about new opportunities.
name: Clay Burnett Group
